words.definition: the act of watching a person or activity and making certain that everything is done correctly, safely, etc
the time when someone is not at work
(of something) that must be done; necessary by law or a rule
to ask someone a lot of questions for a long time in order to get information, sometimes using threats or violence
to make someone responsible for what they do and demand a satisfactory reason for it
strong official criticism of a person or their behaviour
to do things that are risky or dangerous
to criticize, punish, or be unkind to the same person often and unfairly
the quality in someone or something that makes him, her, or it attractive or interesting
